column4: (1)  Every  charge  under  this  Code  shall  state  the
offence with which the accused is charged.
(2) If  the law  which creates  the offence gives it  any
specific  name,  the  offence  may  be  described  in  the
(3) If the law which creates the offence does not give
it any specific name, so much of the definition of the
offence  must  be  stated  as  will  give  the  accused
notice of the matter with which he is charged.
(4) The law  and section of the law under which the
offence  said  to  have  been  committed  is  punishable
